question: My boyfriend and I had sex and the condom broke. It was during my fertile time.?
question_content: I took the morning after pill right away. Should I be ok?

answers.answer_content: Probably you're fine.  If you want to make sure, you should take one of those early reaction pregnancy tests or go to a clinic and have a blood test done, but if you took the pill very soon afterwards, you're most likely not pregnant.
expect pregnancy to happen soon if your egg cell get's fertilized. better buy a pregnancy kit to stop your worrying.
yes, but you might wanna go to the doctor just in case!  it's always better to be safe.
